title: Crazy Face Watch Android Wear
summary: With this fun Watch Face you'll always smileEven if you're late!
description: Go crazy looking into eyes to see the time.In the left eye, the hours are rendered. while on the right, the minutes are rendered.And as seconds... What's better than a tongue?Also you can change the color of your "Crazy Face" easly from the Watchface settings.
descriptionHTML:
Go crazy looking into eyes to see the time.

In the left eye, the hours are rendered. while on the right, the minutes are rendered.
And as seconds... What's better than a tongue?

Also you can change the color of your "Crazy Face" easly from the Watchface settings.
comments: Look neat I can't change the settings.
